title: Family-Friendly Townsville BIG4 Park with Two Pools, Water Park & Mini Golf
description: Bring the whole family along for a coastal getaway full of fond memories, good times and thrilling fun at BIG4 Ingenia Holidays Townsville. Enjoy the comfort and space of a self-contained cabin close to the park’s exciting facilities - from the various pools to the waterpark for kids. A short drive allows for exploration of nearby stretches of coast, green reserves and small-town charm. Wander around the park on foot, push bike or peddle kart and enjoy a game of mini golf while the kids entertain themselves on the jumping pillow.

title: Townsville Coastal Escape with Room Upgrade, Daily Breakfast & Wine
description:
Relax in absolute comfort in the heart of Townsville - a major gateway to the Great Barrier Reef - at The Robert Towns. With modern hotel-style facilities, this is your perfect base after long days exploring the reef, rainforest, or the outback.

Discover the gems of this coastal northern Queensland town including national parks, hidden beaches, and the kaleidoscopic of colours in the Great Barrier Reef. Your hotel is also within easy reach of top city attractions including the pink granite monolith Castle Hill, Museum of Tropical Queensland, Queensland Country Bank Stadium, and Reef HQ Aquarium. Trawl the main shopping strip or dine in the many restaurants lining the waterfront, and don't also miss The Strand, a 2.2-kilometre beachfront promenade with a free water park.

title: Tropical North Queensland Seaside Townsville Retro-Glamour with Welcome Cocktails & A$100 Dining Credit
description:
Miami-style glamour, playful Australiana and effortless retro cool abound at Townsville’s only boutique casino and resort: The Ville Resort-Casino. Tropical North Queensland’s trendiest all-in-one entertainment destination is spectacularly located on the edge of the Coral Sea, and offers breathtaking views over Magnetic Island, along with a dazzling wealth of facilities. You won't be able to tear yourself away, with six acclaimed restaurants and bars, a thrilling casino and a legendary infinity pool. Book a private poolside cabana and sip the afternoon away, indulge with a visit to the onsite Hands in Harmony spa or bet it all on black - The Ville Resort-Casino is a slice of city sophistication in the heart of the far north.

Offering a flop-and-drop escape with no shortage of fun, The Ville Resort-Casino is also the perfect base to explore the greater Townsville region’s stunning landscapes. Catch a ferry to Magnetic Island’s abundance of picture-perfect shores and wondrous bushland hikes, wander through family favourite, The Strand Rockpool and Water Park, or grab your diving gear and head out for the adventure of a lifetime in the great blue beyond.
offer_address: Sir Leslie Thiess Drive, Townsville, Queensland 4810, Australia

title: Grand Opening: Five-Star North Queensland Waterfront Luxury with Rooftop Infinity Pool, Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Indulge in the epitome of extravagance by becoming one of the first to stay within the lavish confines of Townsville's inaugural five-star luxury hotel. Pioneering a new era of opulence in North Queensland, this 132-room oceanfront haven is the latest gem from renowned luxury hotelier The Morris Group, known for properties such as Orpheus Island Lodge, Mt Mulligan Lodge and Beechmont Estate. With a rooftop infinity pool offering breathtaking views of the Coral Sea, sophisticated modern architecture, superb dining options and an indulgent day spa for holistic relaxation, prepare to immerse yourself in opulence like never before.

Indulge in authentic Japanese delicacies at groundfloor Terasu, savour steak and seafood delights at Marmor on the top floor and unwind with a curated cocktail at Ardo Rooftop. Venture beyond the hotel to the enchanting beauty of Magnetic Island, celebrated for its lively marine ecosystem and breathtaking sunsets. For adventurers seeking more, nearby treasures like Wallaman Falls and Little Crystal Creek await exploration.
offer_address: 67 Sir Leslie Thiess Drive, Townsville, Queensland 4810, Australia

title: Townsville Seaside Resort Glamour with Sunset Cocktails & Dining Credit
description:
You are invited to experience Miami-inspired glamour and retro style at Townsville’s only boutique casino and resort: The Ville Resort-Casino - Queensland’s most stylish entertainment destination. After undergoing major renovations, this iconic resort is now an award-winning destination bringing glamour and sophistication to the shores of Townsville.

Spectacularly located on the edge of the Coral Sea and offering superb views over Magnetic Island, The Ville Resort-Casino offers state-of-the-art facilities including top-rated restaurants, high-class bars and the exciting The Ville Casino. This is the place to be and be seen in Townsville.

Your lavish escape includes daily breakfast, a daily drink or cocktail voucher per person, A$50 food and drinks credit to spend across the resort’s restaurants and bars, and A$10 Match and Play casino voucher.

**Magnetic Island Upgrade:** Want to experience the beauty of Magnetic Island with a romantic picnic? Check out the Magnetic Island Upgrade, which includes return ferry tickets to the island and a gourmet picnic hamper for two.
offer_address: Sir Leslie Thiess Dr, Townsville QLD 4810

title: Iconic Townsville Coastal City Stay
description: Escape to the tropical coastal city of Townsville, Queensland, staying in the heart of it all at one of its most iconic hotels: Hotel Grand Chancellor. As the tallest building in Townsville - known as the ‘sugar shaker’ for its unusual shape - this impressive hotel offers stunning views across the city, Castle Hill, and towards Magnetic Island. You're also in a prime location within walking distance of award-winning restaurants and nightlife.

title: Lush Tropical Leisure at Mercure Townsville Resort
description:
Comfort and convenience go hand-in-hand on the lush resort grounds of Mercure Townsville, just minutes away from the airport and the heart of town. Whether you’re swimming the Great Barrier Reef or walking the sandy stretches of Townsville’s spectacular beaches, you can return to your verdant haven and unwind after long days spent exploring Tropical North Queensland.

Savour hearty al fresco dining at poolside Celsius Restaurant and Bar, using fresh local produce to bring their culinary vision to life. With spacious rooms featuring light and airy design, Townsville’s largest freeform pool and outdoor spa, your time at Mercure Townsville is sure to impress.

title: Contemporary Townsville Escape with Infinity Pool & Jacuzzi
description: Run away to Tropical North Queensland with a stay at Oaks Townsville Gateway Suites. Perfectly positioned to explore Townsville's vibrant dining scene, this contemporary retreat offers easy access to the iconic Great Barrier Reef and Magnetic Island. Savour the culinary delights of Palmer Street, just a short stroll away, before returning to your room or apartment to admire the stunning city and marina views, or taking a scenic dip in the elevated infinity pool.
offer_address: 2 Dibbs Street, Townsville City, Queensland, 4810, Australia
